description: Disallow any commands in DMs from others, with adjustable settings.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing! Use `[p]help nodms` for more info. This cog has been edited by Guyonsteroids. If you need support feel free to reach out to me in the #support (<#992344272529535087>) of this server.
